title: Drawing, 1938-88-1368
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, graphite
markings: Verso: Cooper Union Museum for the Arts of Decoration (Lugt#457d and 457e)
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Horizontal rectangle. The left half. The pillar at left is decorated with a triglyph. In the center of the front is a cross in a circle. Colored background.
